Package com.soprabanking.ips.models

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.models.Comment
@Entity
public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a comment made by a User on a given Proposal.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Comment entity in the database.

A User can make any number of comments on a particular Proposal.A Proposal can have any number of comments.A comment can be deleted either explicitly(User,who has created the comment ,deletes it) or implicitly(either User who has made the comment is removed from the system or the Proposal for which comment has been created is deleted from the database)

Author:
araghav
See Also:
User, Proposal
